title: Bitcoin plunge continues, erasing gains since Trump’s election
full_text: Bitcoin plunge continues, erasing gains since Trump’s election. The world's most popular cryptocurrency has fallen nearly 20 percent in value since the start of 2026.. Bitcoin has dropped below $71,000, adding to a week of losses that have wiped out all of its gains since United States President Donald Trumps re-election in 2024.
